text: Doctors are experienced and receptionist is friendly! Unlike other clinics which require extensive treatments, the doctors here promised a few treatments only would heal my knees. I went a few times only for knee injuries treatments and have seen big improvements! Had sore neck due to tension and sore neck was treated right away in a session. Worth every visits. Would revisit again. Thank you Kanji Physical!
Looking forward to go, the treatment since moderate is 1st visit is sgd$120 and subsequent visit is sgd$100.
Got excellent treatment for my Frozen shoulders which I was suffering for almost 2 years

God hands to cure pains and numbness by fixing the alignment of the bones and joints. My back stiffness form scoliosis has been eased as he places my spine in the right alignment. Amazing. May be hard to book the time slot as many are seeing him. I am grateful that the pain and tension in my back caused by my long-standing scoliosis has clearly decreased. Due to the coronavirus, it may be a challenge to make reservations as treatment times are limited.
